urls.title: Fresh from the paint shop, Air Canada brings Cargo’s new livery to life for its freighter fleet
urls.description: Air Canada’s freighter fleet is getting a fresh new look. The first newly painted Boeing 767 freighter has rolled out of the paint shop, featuring an Air Canada Cargo design that reflects Air...

data.text:
Our first newly painted @Boeing 767 #freighter has rolled out of the paint shop, bringing to life an Air Canada Cargo design that reflects Air Canada’s distinctive and timeless black, white and red livery first introduced in 2017. 

Learn more here: https://t.co/R9oGokN2L1 https://t.co/QBTKDINMNT

urls.title: Tout juste sorti de l’atelier de peinture, un appareil arbore la toute nouvelle livrée du parc aérien d’Air Canada Cargo!
urls.description: Le parc d’avions-cargos d’Air Canada adopte une toute nouvelle allure. Le premier avion-cargo 767 de Boeing fraîchement peint vient tout juste de sortir de l’atelier de peinture et arbore...

data.text:
Notre premier #avion-cargo 767 de @Boeing fraîchement peint sort tout juste de l’atelier et donne vie aux couleurs d’Air Canada Cargo, qui s’inspirent de son unique et intemporelle livrée noir, blanc et rouge lancée en 2017. 

En savoir plus : https://t.co/9lAQdSOtAt https://t.co/ByKDWhQbIs

urls.title: Air Canada and United Airlines Expand Relationship to Make Transborder Travel Easier, With More Choice
urls.description: Expanded relationship to bring more flights, improved schedule coordination and shared reward benefits between the MileagePlus and Aeroplan loyalty programs MONTREAL, July 22, 2022 /CNW Telbec/ -...

data.text:
We're pleased to expand our relationship with @united to bring more flight options to customers, improve schedule coordination and offer shared reward benefits between the Aeroplan and MileagePlus loyalty programs. 
More: https://t.co/UGL1kCTGBM https://t.co/Z3fTEL8CxK

urls.description: Le partenariat élargi permettra l'accroissement du nombre de vols, une meilleure coordination des horaires et la réciprocité des privilèges pour les membres des programmes de fidélité...

data.text:

En savoir plus : https://t.co/c1OzvWeFtm https://t.co/FZmUNCmUnH

urls.title: Air Canada Named One of Canada's Best Employers for Diversity by Forbes

data.text: We are proud to be recognized as one of Canada's Best Diversity Employers by @Forbes in its inaugural ranking of Canadian companies, for our commitment to help employees achieve goals within a diversified, equitable & inclusive work environment. urls.title: Air Canada and Emirates Form Strategic Partnership
urls.description: Air Canada and Emirates today announced the signing of a strategic partnership agreement that will create more options for customers when travelling on the carriers' networks while also enhancing...

data.text:
We are very pleased to form a strategic partnership with @emirates & plan to establish a codeshare in 2022 that will offer enhanced travel choices for Air Canada customers travelling to the United Arab Emirates & to destinations beyond Dubai. 
Learn more: https://t.co/LpzxGoiqBj https://t.co/FEedsv8FB5

data.text:

Pour en savoir plus : https://t.co/Faq6I50Rxq https://t.co/md451avrLM
